title: PCEP Certified Entry-Level Python Programmer
name: PCEP Certified Entry-Level Python Programmer
body:
PCEP Certified Entry-Level Python Programmer
  • Scope:
    • Basic Programming Concepts, Techniques and Best Practices.
    • Data Types, Evaluations, and Basic Input-Output Operations.
    • Flow Control: Loops, and Conditional Blocks.
    • Data Collections: Lists, Tuples, and Dictionaries.
    • Functions.
  • Issuing Organization: Python Institute
  • Issuing Date: December 2020.
  • Certification Code: Qk5z.mYyt.NfOy
  • Score: 100/100
  • Certification Verification Page: Verify Certification
